org.ajgl.collision

Class SAT

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ajgl.collision.SAT

  • public final class SAT
extends java.lang.Object
    This class was designed to use The Hyperplane Separation Theorem with 2D objects.
    Author:
    Tyler Bucher
